species.name: sneasler
descriptions: Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.

abilities.name: pressure
abilities.effect: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.

abilities.name: unburden
abilities.effect: Doubles Speed upon using or losing a held item.

abilities.name: poison-touch
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning target Pokémon upon contact.
